channel.title: Need someone smart
channel.description: MY SERVER NULLS SO FRICKEN CONSTANTLY. Delta base, 317. There's no errors while compiling, no anti leeches. Sometimes when players try to log in, or after they DC, they get nulled. Their screen is black, they can't click anything, but they can type. Others can see what they type, and they can see their characters. The person that's typings name comes up as "Null" to him, and his regular name to others. The only way i can fix this is by restarting the server. Is anyone smart enough to fix this? Thanks.

item.title: Need someone smart
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

[quote=“hitman2009, post:4, topic:308394”][quote author=Arch_iz_l33t link=topic=404838.msg2994244#msg2994244 date=1255473194]
Theres so much shitty code in Delta it will do this I believe, I ran into this problem with Deltascape but that was over a year ago and you should stop using this base unless you want to waste your time cleaning it out and deleting useless code.
[/quote]
Already cleaned it out, and i wasn’t asking for opinions on the delta source, i was asking for a way to fix this nulling. Aparrantly nobody is clever enough to fix it, and neither am i.[/quote]

Just because we don’t tell you how doesn’t mean we don’t know. Deltascape has an anti-mopar client system that nulls specific clients.

Read full topic

item.title: Need someone smart
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Dude, the server source is fucked up! did you change anything before or is it new! this is just a option for you!
delete the current one! go to runelocus gtfo of delta base! search massacred! it’s a pvp source with vesta and shet! if you do, you’ll be famous!!! it’s usally gets around 40 people per day!

Read full topic

item.title: Need someone smart
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

Arch_iz_l33t:

Theres so much shitty code in Delta it will do this I believe, I ran into this problem with Deltascape but that was over a year ago and you should stop using this base unless you want to waste your time cleaning it out and deleting useless code.

Already cleaned it out, and i wasn’t asking for opinions on the delta source, i was asking for a way to fix this nulling. Aparrantly nobody is clever enough to fix it, and neither am i.

Read full topic

item.title: Need someone smart
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

Delta sucks, Learn Czar or wL.

Any work you do on a Delta will be looked at as shit and a leech so don’t use it. Waste of time.
